metadata.synopsis: Little kid talkign to the player-- trying to be tough.

0.speaker: Zaki
0.text: You don't look so tough. Mol fought off a hobgoblin all by herself.
0.context: NodeContext: Tough guy act from a kid. Potentially referring to Lae'zel (toad-lady)

1.speaker: Zaki
1.text: Give Mol a tenday and she'll own Baldur's Gate. You'll see.
